AND (? IS NULL OR td.TD_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) AND (? = 'all' OR td.STATUS = ?) AND (? IS NULL OR m.MEMBER_NAME LIKE ?) ORDER BY td.TD_DATE DESC
